title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
alogue options.

Go ahead, Lae'zel. You've earned it. Stand back. I'm going first. [INVESTIGATION] Examine the device

If dialogue 3 was chosen you will need to pass the Investigation check with a DC of 15. It continues to describe the device as an ingenious synthesis of illithid anatomy and metal alloys that hums with psionic energy. Lae'zel appears to be getting impatient. You will have these dialogue options.

Go ahead Lae'zel. You've earned it. Stand back. I'm going first.

Choosing dialog 1
